body.name: Memory Foam Pillows Queen Size Set of 2 - Cooling Bed Pillows for Sleeping - Back, Stomach, Side Sleeper Firm, Comfy Cool Shredded - 2 Pack, Rayon Derived from Bamboo
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 14. Order within 5 hrs 8 mins
features: Shredded memory foam pillows: We've designed the best pillows for sleeping. Our memory foam pillows use a cooling shredded foam technology to keep you cool all night. The breathable cover keeps your pillow dry and provides maximum comfort.

Washable pillow cases: Our cooling pillowcases are a great alternative to down or latex pillows. The pillow covers are also washable. Each memory foam pillow is made from 60% polyester and 40% viscous rayon.
Can help alleviate common sleeping ailments: Our queen bed pillows can help provide relief from several sleeping issues including snoring, insomnia, migraines, neck and back pain, and TMJ.

Great for all sleeping styles: These shredded foam pillows are great for side sleepers, back sleepers and stomach sleepers. The pliable memory foam Rayon derived from Bamboo Pillow conforms to the shape of your head and body keeping the spinal column in your neck and back aligned properly.

Cooling queen size pillows: These cooling shredded memory foam pillows will never go flat. Once fully expanded, each pillow measures 28” x 17” x 8”. Memory foam is great for those who prefer soft or firm pillows. Pillows come with a FULL 10 year warranty.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best Pillows I have used to sleep on!
reviews.reviewText: I have purchased these pillows about a year ago. I just purchased another pair of these pillows because they are just that good! The quality of sleep is much better than any other pillow I have ever used prior! I have been trying to train my body to sleep on my back and these pillows have allowed me to do just that with support and comfort at the same time. When I use these pillows for sleep I never wake up with neck or upper back pain anymore. I always had back and neck problems growing up because of how I sleep but this product is definitely worth every penny! The pillows themselves take a while to inflate once you remove them from their packaging but I promise they are worth it! You will sleep so much better! I also bought the bed length size cool bamboo pillow as well!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These are great pillows. They are so comfortable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Loose and Lumpy
reviews.reviewText: I expected these to be much firmer from past bamboo pillows that I have purchased. These are not very firm at all and lose their shape quite quickly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I am a pillow snob but when I went to visit my son he had these pillows in his guest bedroom. I had the best nights sleep and had to check out who made them. I have bought two sets so far and will recommend to all my friends and family.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Great but take a long time to become comfortable
reviews.reviewText: I really like firm pillows so I decided to purchase these because they are advertised as firm and made from bamboo. They came in a reasonable time and you have to pull them out of a tightly packaged zip bag so they are flat as a pancake at first. After you massage them over and over for several minutes, the instructions say to leave them for at least 24 hours so gain shape. I did all of this and then tried to lie down on them. These are definitely extra super firm to the point that they weren’t even malleable and my head wouldn’t pay flat. If you are a side sleeper, these will work great right out the gate for you. I happen to be a back sleeper so my circulation kept getting cut off all night because my chin ended up in my chest and I couldn’t breathe for the first few nights. I am going to keep using them and see how they do after a month or so because I watched a few YouTube videos that say these bamboo pillows will eventually soften a little to the point where they stay firm but won’t choke us back sleepers. I will update my review if things change.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It’s nice pillows!
reviews.reviewText: This will cushion your head on your bed. These are the second set we have purchased because we love them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars HARD AS A ROCK-NOT THE SAME AS SOLD IN STORES
reviews.reviewText: I have been searching for awhile for a pillow with the right amount of height and support. I had purchased these in the past in stores and remembered being happy with them so I purchased them again and what I received was a VERY different product. They come vacuum sealed and rolled up into cylinders (and you literally have to cut them out of the packaging so I'm not sure how they accept returns...we'll find out). It took a couple of days for them to rebound enough to even distribute the material within the case and I had hope that the material would continue to relax as they were used but that hasn't happened at all after a month of use. They continue to be as hard as they were when they were received and have absolutely no give at all. You seriously may as well be trying to sleep on a cinder block. They're so hard you can't even try to manually reshape them. I'm not sure if the material simply can't withstand the vacuum sealing process or if this is a completely different product that I had previously purchased. Woke up this morning with an extremely stiff and painful neck and decided it was time to give up on them. Will be trying to return but not sure how that's going to go because again you're not able to get them back into their package after you cut them out of it (I didn't keep it anyway because of that and my confidence that I would like this product because I had used it before).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars my whole family uses these pillows!
reviews.reviewText: I freaking love these. the set i have now ive had for over a year and they are still super big and supportive. i cant sleep with anything else. my mom, sister, brother, and father all have these pillows! **easy to wash - and the dryer has an amazing effect!**
Don’t like the height of pillow

En realidad el relleno no es WOW pero aceptablemente ok. Lo que hace la diferencia con esta almohada es la suavidad y frescura del cubrealmohada o funda. Es una delicia al tacto y sufro cuando las meto a lavar porque pasan algunos días hasta que se las vuelvo a poner. La suavidad o grosor es muy subjetivo. A mí me pare bien, y a mi pareja le parece muy delgada, a mi la suavidad esta bien, a mi pareja le parece dura. Pese a que dice que es tamaño Queen, es más bien tamaño individual.

Pillows were cold when they arrived so took them out and thought they would fluff up after they warmed up. No. Put in dryer. Still no. Have to pull apart foam chips. Must be something else besides memory foam-chips type of fill. Some type of chemical waste? They will be used fie staging but can’t imagine using as pillows.

Me asuste cuando llegaron porque vienen hechas una bola, hay que pisarlas un buen rato y dejarlas descansar unas 24 horas. Después de eso genial. Agarran forma al dormir y luego vuelves a su forma original, muy cómodas, frescas (no te suda la cabeza) y pues nunca me ha dolido el cuello pero tampoco me duele ahora así que muy bien!
Pensé que eran más firmes, pero en general, están muy bien.
